## normalizeSourceMappingURL() function

Utility method to make a relative URL like "bundle.js.map" into a resolvable URL like "https://example.com/bundle.js.map" or "./example/bundle.js.map"

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function normalizeSourceMappingURL(compiledJsUrlOrFilename: string, sourcemapRelativeUrl: string | null, dependencies: NormalizeUrlDependencies): string | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  compiledJsUrlOrFilename | string |  |
|  sourcemapRelativeUrl | string \| null | if this is null, the default guess is compiledJsUrl + ".map" |
|  dependencies | [NormalizeUrlDependencies](./download-webapp-sources.normalizeurldependencies.md) |  |

**Returns:**

string \| null

URL resolvable from working directory

## Example


```typescript
let compiledJsUrl, dependencies

const compiledJsStr = await fetchFile(compiledJsUrl, dependencies)
const sourceMapUrl = normalizeSourceMappingURL(
  compiledJsUrl,
  getSourceMappingURL(compiledJsStr),
  dependencies,
)
const sourceMapStr = await fetchFile(sourceMapUrl, dependencies)
const sourceMapConsumer = await new SourceMapConsumer(sourceMapStr)
const sourceContents =
  await getSourceContents(sourceMapUrl, sourceMapConsumer, dependencies)
```
